Articles.Content:
I'll post one here, and maybe more as we go. Hope to hear more from you guys!

A Kerbal once landed on Duna

and looked up at it's moon-a

his orbiter crashed

on Ike as it passed

I don't ever eat tuna

Eve is purple, Layth is blue

Jool is green, that much is true

Bill's manner is mellow

His spacesuit yellow

From all the chunks Bob blew

Rover, rover, why do you fly?

Over small bumps and pebbles, why?

When your wheels rumble

You begin to tumble

And dart off into the sky

Edited February 27, 2014 by thereaverofdarkness
Ha Ha I will have to write my own!

spaceman1999 posted on my thread

And ensured it would not soon be dead

I have faith he can

Craft one better than

Anything I have made so far you've read
